mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Margaret, Hannah, and Martha Pratt
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Margaret, Hannah, and Martha Pratt Hannah turned 21 years of age 01.08.1891 J. Thomas Knowles, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 4, page 433, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
